alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 2:10PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Thunderstorms Producing Heavy Rain and Minor Flooding Will Impact Portions Of Norfolk and Plymouth Counties... At 207 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking several thunderstorms from near Weymouth to around Cohasset. These storms were moving northeast at 15 to 20 mph. HAZARD...Heavy Rainfall and Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Brockton, Weymouth, Braintree, Randolph, Marshfield, Hingham, Scituate, Pembroke, Rockland, Abington, Duxbury, Whitman, Hanover, East Bridgewater, Holbrook, Norwell, Hull, Hanson, Cohasset, and West Bridgewater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth
